moves.8. g3 Qe7: Yuck...I HATE closed positions! (I suppose this isn't too closed, but more so than my liking.)
I know I'm not supposed to trade when I'm down, but
moves.20. Rxf6: He resigns. In this game, we both hung our fair share of pieces! Somehow, I came out ahead. Personally, I don't think that he should have resigned yet, therefore, I don't think I truly won this game. But a win is a win, eh?
